I don't see how you can call a 1080p rip at 1460kbps good quality. The minimum bitrate that should even be used on 720p is 4000kbps and for animated 720p movies 2300kbps. This is 1080p, so you need an even higher bitrate because of the increased amount of pixels. Minimum 1080p bitrate should be 8000kbps. Look this shit up...
